data.actual_result: The loading gif is a bit towards top left.
data.expected_result: The loading gif is either at the centre of the page or at centered horizontally.
data.short_description: [Website bug, Mobile only]The loading in the Developer Portal isn't centered while your applications are loading.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to https(colon)//discordapp(dot)com/developers/applications - While your applications are loading, look at the loading (a slow internet connection helps).
